pageContext.claim: “In the last two years of the previous administration, farm income plummeted by more than $30 billion, and agricultural exports dropped by over $22 billion.”
pageContext.analysis: Agricultural export values did decrease $15.3 billion (not $22 billion) during the last two years of the Obama administration, but even with that decrease, export values rose 17 percent over Obama’s time in office, according to FactCheck.org.
